name: That One Time I was a magical cupcake fighting a wizard baker!
name_original: That One Time I was a magical cupcake fighting a wizard baker!
description:
This game was made for the Pirate Software 11th game jam - Unusual Magic.

You are pitted against a wizard baker who wants to destroy you simply for having frosting! You must defeat him and his army of preferred pastries using your magical spells! 

Controls

Mouse and KeyboardGamePadMove
WASDLeft StickAimMouse Right StickWand AttackLeft ClickSouth Button/
Right TriggerFrosting Spell
hold to channelRight ClickEast Button/
Left TriggerFrosting Spell 
Press when frosting is outRight ClickEast Button/
Left Trigger

Credits 

Made by Eric  @TigerFrogGames

With Brainstorming Ideas from DrFinch
